Documentation.UserDocu: This object allows to compute the turbulence intensity from ASCE-98
computeASCETurbulenceIntensityValue(height, intensity10) -> float\n height = the height of the simulation point intensity10 = turbulence intensity at height equal to 10 m

computeASNZ1170TurbulenceIntensityValue(height, intensity10, exponent) -> float\n height = the height of the simulation point intensity10 = turbulence intensity at height equal to 10 m exponent = this the exponent value
computeEurocodeTurbulenceIntensityValue(height, referenceHeight) -> float\n height = the height of the simulation point referenceHeight = a reference height
computeIS875TurbulenceIntensityValue(height, referenceHeight) -> float\n height = the height of the simulation point referenceHeight = a reference height
computeISOTurbulenceIntensityValue(height, referenceHeight) -> float\n height = the height of the simulation point referenceHeight = a reference height
